speed.label: Speed
speed.desc: Increases the speed of your tank

bullet_speed.label: Bullet Speed
bullet_speed.desc: Increases the speed of fired bullets

bullet_damage.label: Bullet Damage
bullet_damage.desc: Increases the damage dealt by bullets

max_health.label: Max Health
max_health.desc: Increases the total health of your tank

armor.label: Armor
armor.desc: Reduces damage taken from enemy bullets

barrel_spread.label: Barrel Spread
barrel_spread.desc: Reduces the random spread of bullets

recoil.label: Recoil
recoil.desc: Reduces the knockback effect when firing

turn_speed.label: Turn Speed
turn_speed.desc: Increases the rate at which your tank rotates
